title: Shop for ingredients
text:
sirloin steak
tomatoes
onions
garlic
spring garden mix
pears

title: Shop for dinner ware
text:
wine glasses
napkins
tablecloth
serving dishes

title: Gather flowers
text:
pull out all vases
cut flowers from garden and arrange in vases
set about the house

title: Ready music
text: select mood appropriate music and arrange the albums accordingly
